name: HypnoHeist
description:
In one week we made a 2D Stealth game to Brackeys Jam 7 , the theme is "It's NOT Real" and when you are playing Hypno Heist, you're raiding a tricky bank.

@NRCode a Game Dev Programmer

@Loninhu_o  a Pixel Artist

and Feridinha a Programmer
